content: सव्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [<ls>Uṇ. 4. 109</ls>] {@--1@} Left, left-hand. {@--2@} Southern. {@--3@} Contrary, backward, reverse, {@--4@} Right. --व्यः An epithet of Viṣṇu. --व्यं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} The usual position of the sacred thread when it hangs down over the left shoulder; <ab>cf.</ab> अपसव्य.
